28865146:
Lay, baby, lay,
Lay across my big, brass bed.
Lay, baby, lay,
Lay across my big, brass bed.

Whatever colors you have in your mind,
I'm gonna show them to ya and I'll make them shine.
Lay, baby, lay,
Lay across my big, brass bed.

Stay, baby, stay,
Stay with your woman awhile.
...

It's early mornin'. I should be in bed.
I guess you better go now.
Got to work tomorrow. Rather sleep instead.
But remember my baby must be fed.

See you lookin' like you wanna kiss me now.
I've seen that look before.
What's the use now, use in trying now,
Trying now what didn't work before?

Let's remember now, things are different now.
We both know where we stand.
...

When I think about the good love you gave me
I cry like a baby.
Livin' without you is driving me crazy.
I cry like a baby.

Lord knows now that you're not a plaything,
Not a toy, or a puppet on a string.

When I think about a love so sweet now
I cry like a baby.
Every road is a lonely street now.
I cry like a baby.
...

Take me to heart
And I'll always love you.
And nobody can make me do wrong.
Taking me for granted,
Leaving love unshown,
Makes willpower weak and temptation strong.

A woman's only human.
You should understand.
She's not just a plaything,
...

When you meet a boy
That you like a lot
And you fall in love
But he loves you not

If a flame should start
As you hold him near
Better keep your heart
Out of danger, dear

For the way of love
Is a way of woe
And the day may come
When you'll see him go
...

I was born in the wagon of a travelin' show
My mama used to dance for the money they'd throw
Papa would do whatever he could
Preach a little gospel, sell a couple bottles of Doctor Good
Gypsys, tramps, and thieves
We'd hear it from the people of the town
They'd call us gypsys, tramps, and thieves
But every night all the men would come around
And lay their money down
Picked up a boy just south of Mobile
Gave him a ride, filled him with a hot meal
I was sixteen, he was twenty-one
Rode with us to Memphis
...

They go off leaving me behind.
They have so many worlds to find.
I run to catch a glimpse of them,
Just watching in the sun,
Knowing they'll be mine again
When evening has begun.

And when I see them hand in hand,
The boy who walks beside the man,
I pray that I will always have
The world that I have found.
...

I've seen fire and I've seen rain.
I've seen sunny days I thought would never end.
I've seen lonely times when I could not find a friend.
But I always thought that I'd see you agian.

Just yesterday mornin' they let me know that you were gone.
Seems them plans they'd made put an end to you.
I walked out this mornin' and I wrote down this song.
I just can't remember who to send it to.

I've seen fire and I've seen rain.
I've seen sunny days I thought would never end.
I've seen lonely times when I could not find a friend.
But I always thought that I'd see you again.
...

When you find out where you're goin',
Let me know.
'Cause I love you just enough
To let you go.
When you're runnin' free and clear,
Please don't disappear.
When you find out where you're goin',
Let me know.

When you find out where you're goin',
Count me in.
...

The road is long
With many a windin' turn
That leads us to who
Knows where, who knows where.
But I'm strong.
I'm strong enough to carry him.
He ain't heavy.
He's my brother.

So on we go.
His welfare is my concern.
...

You were the only thing I had
How could a good love go so bad?
Somehow I guess I should have known
That you would leave me here alone

They say you found somebody new
But that won't change my love for you
...

Don't make no difference if you laid down and cried.
You know that you lied to me.
And if you come to me with tears in your eyes,
Don't say goodbye.
Just leave.

'Cause I'm in the middle of somethin'
I don't understand.
How can my reasons for livin'
Slip right through my hands?
I'm in the middle of somethin'
I don't understand.
And it looks like I lose again.

Don't make no difference what you think of me.
...

I know we can make it, baby,
If only we tried.
Let's hang on to love
And don't let it die.
Even though...

It's been touch and go,
Off and on,
Weak and strong.
But then we didn't know
That with hope we could cope.
With all the ups and downs.
So please stay around.
I need you so.

...

I can't find a four-leaf clover rainbow.
I could find it if I wanted to.
I believe if you put your mind to somethin'
Well there ain't anything in this world
You could not do.

What I can't find:
One honest mind.
Why can't I find me
One honest mind?
Don't understand.

The only thing I ever wanted
Was a little bouquet of truth from him.
...
